1091410.name: Invisible
1091410.description:
BECOME THE ULTIMATE EXORCIST TO PURIFY EVIL NINJA SPIRITS!
A VR HORROR ACTION GAME SET IN THE CURSED MANSION OF THE MISUMI NINJA CLAN.
UTILIZES THE REVEALATION ORB AND SACRED KUNAI TO LOCATE THE INVISIBLE EVIL NINJA SPIRITS AND PURIFY THEM!
PHOTOREALISTIC HORROR EXPERIENCE CREATED THROUGH PHOTOSCANING TV DRAMAS/MOVIES PROPS AND SETS FROM SHOUCHIKU STUDIO

CAN YOU FACE THE FEAR ?

Features:

  • Locate invisible ninja ghosts with Revelation Orb.
    - Make invisible ghosts temporary visible by throwing Revelation Orb. Braking Orb nearby evil spirits will make temporary visible to you.

  • Purify ghosts by throwing Kunai blades.
    - Throw Kunai to take an damage to evil sprits.

  • Explore the haunted mansion without being detected.
    - Many ghosts going hither and thither in the mansion. Try NOT to moving into their field of vision.

  • Face strong bosses.
    - Fight with unique bosses and defeat them!

  • Experience story mode.
    - As a Exorcist, solve a mystery of Misumi clan's curse.

  • Photorealistic world
    - Photorealistic horror experience created through photoscaning tv dramas/movies props and sets from Shouchiku Studio
1091410.supported_languages:
英语*, 日语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
